targets.query:
from(bucket: "bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Z_Overall")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "RPM")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] ==  "Bearing")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Unbalance")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Misalignment")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] ==  "Losseness")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] ==  "Misalignment_percentage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] ==  "Losseness_percentage")

from(bucket: "bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] ==  "Gear_mesh_percentage")

  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Van_Pass_percentage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "Hourly_Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] ==  "X_Overall" or r["resourceName"] == "Y_Overall" or r["resourceName"] == "Z_Overall")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Hourly_Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Bearing" or r["_field"] == "Unbalance" or r["_field"] == "Misalignment" or r["_field"] == "Losseness" or r["_field"] == "Gear_mesh" or r["_field"] == "Van_Pass")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Hourly_Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Bearing_percentage" or r["_field"] == "Gear_mesh_percentage" or r["_field"] == "Losseness_percentage" or r["_field"] == "Misalignment_percentage" or r["_field"] == "Unbalance_percentage" or r["_field"] == "Van_Pass_percentage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Daily_Bucket")
  |> range(start: 2023-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Z_Overall")
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_value"])
  |> stateCount(fn: (r) => r._value >0, column: "stateCount") 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r.stateCount >0 then r.stateCount else 0 })) 
  |> drop(columns: ["stateCount"]) 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "Daily_Bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] ==  "X_Overall" or r["resourceName"] == "Y_Overall" or r["resourceName"] == "Z_Overall")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "Sensor01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Bearing" or r["_field"] == "Unbalance" or r["_field"] == "Misalignment" or r["_field"] == "Losseness" or r["_field"] == "Gear_mesh" or r["_field"] == "Van_Pass")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Bearing_percentage" or r["_field"] == "Gear_mesh_percentage" or r["_field"] == "Losseness_percentage" or r["_field"] == "Misalignment_percentage" or r["_field"] == "Unbalance_percentage" or r["_field"] == "Van_Pass_percentage")
